level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among states enacting it.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 13-91 validated a previously made technical amendment.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-147, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 21-2101.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 18 of the Uniform Statutory Form Power of Attorney Act. See 8B Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.
